bibdata.title: IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Advanced Audio and Video Coding Amendment 1: Extension on timing and location information to support object tracking across multiple cameras at Surveillance High Group

IEEE Approved Draft Standard for Advanced Audio and Video Coding Amendment 1: Extension on timing and location information to support object tracking across multiple cameras at Surveillance High Group

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Extensions to IEEE Std 1857.1-2013 are provided for surveillance video to support tracking across tracing in multiple cameras at surveillance based on the navigation information which mainly includes timing, location and movement information.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
